column10: So you want to take a nap

column9: Then you don't need a nap!

column10: What's the time right now? (Input would be hour from 0[midnight] to 23[11pm])

column9: Interesting sleep schedule...
VERY interesting sleep schedule...
Interesting

column10: Do you have anything important to do, such as, work or deadlines to meet?
Shouldn't you be getting ready for work right now?

column9: Yes, you should check!
Why are you like this? You clearly can't take a nap right now

column10: Ok then, anything due in within the next week?
Do you need to be up within the next 4 hours?

column9: GO TO BED!
You should be sleeping, but since you can't manage your time properly, you should take a nap. Set MULTIPLE alarms
Just go to bed!
Wait for bedtime!

column10: Do you have anything important to be doing? Like homework, assignments, work projects, or plans you've made?
Is it due within the next 3 days?

column9: You should make a start today. Go for a walk, eat and/or have a coffee
Problem solved! Sometimes you're just bored or hungry! :)
Aww, you deserve that nap. Take care of yourself and I hope tomorrow is better! :)

column10: Nice, so any plans later today?

column9: Then of course you can nap! :)

column10: Do you trust yourself to get up in time?

column9: A nap doesn't sound like a good idea... Try eating and having some coffee
Well, I guess you can rest your eyes for a second. Just make sure to set MULTIPLE alarms and that they're really loud!
Problem solved, have fun!

column10: Are you at work or school right now?
...Are you at least on a break?
Would your boss be okay with you taking a nap?
Do you have at least 30 minutes to spare?

column9: I mean if it's ok with your boss... I don't like this. Set some alarms tho
Then you shouldn't! Go have some coffee, smh
DO YOUR WORK!
